captions.text:
It’s gonna be very difficult and I believe
it’s gonna be a very tight race. But I have

A world rally car will be faster, I can tell
you straight away. Sebastian with the world

rally car last year lost. I think for me it
will be difficult.

I think we tried hard. Any way he gave me
a very good advantage in the start.

I did one or two small mistakes. I lost a
bit of speed. Especially in one turn we have

The best time for Stefan 2:32:99 and the best
time for Carlos 02:32:13. The winner is Carlos

For me it is really pleasure to be here and
meet Stefan.

Stefan, that means that you have to wash the
car now.

Yeah, I mean (smile) that’s the way it goes.
I’ve done my best. It was quiet tricky,

but it’s been a nice challenge and I’m
very happy that Carlos was coming all the

way from Spain to see us here. It was also
for me a big pleasure to meet him. I watched

him before in his career. It’s great to
have this kind of fun together. Well, I have
to clean the car now, so

title: KTM Enduro 450 vs VW Race Touareg - Red Bull Motorclash 2

comments.text:
A bike is suited for much rougher and tighter terrain than this but it 
still did well. A car is like a beached whale in real offroad situations, 
and you can ride a bike offroad for 20 years and never even see anything 
more exotic than a pickup with a lift kit. They can go over rough terrain 
if they have room, but they are slow... In real life (with what regular 
people can afford and not on a groomed track) an offroad bike is much much 
faster than anything else. I mean WAY faster.
